value:
That swordswoman who was turned
to stone...she was the one who raised
my daughter when I couldn't.

There is nothing to be gained from
digging into my past. I no longer do.

I was foolish for bringing my daughter
on the road with me. I know I can't
atone, but I want to do what I can...

When my work is done here, I think I
will travel once more.

Nice castle. You should give
$Nf a tour.
Perhaps I am the one who is cursed...
I will be sure to return the favor.

I am Galzus. I have no past or future
to speak of. I only live in darkness
waiting for my death.

Stop peeking at me from there and
just come in.$k$pAre you wondering about my back?
It's what they call a Brand. Mine is of
the Sword Saint Od.$k$pI was part of royal House Ribaut,
but it was put to ruin with others
slaughtered at Dahna.$k$pAfter that, I threw everything away.
My body is clad in death...my hands
stained with blood.$k$pAs I am, I cannot even embrace my
own daughter...$k$pHowever, as a remnant of that
conflict, I can surely be of use
to you.
The name is Galzus. Raydrik hired me.
When my daughter was young... She was carried off by a slave trader.
I am stained by the blood of many men. It is better you forget me.
Eyvel rescued Mareeta and raised her in my place. I owe her.
Mareeta... you've grown up so strong, so gentle.
I will act with honor. I pledge it on the house of Isaach.
